mapper.sql: select dsv.id as dsv_id, dataset_id, dsv.owner_id, version_name as dsv_version_name, version_tag as dsv_version_tag, version_meta as dsv_version_meta, storage_path as dsv_storage_path, status as status, dsv.created_time as dsv_created_time, dsv.modified_time as dsv_modified_time, ds.dataset_name as ds_dataset_name, u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.created_time as user_created_time, u.user_enabled, r.id as role_id, r.role_name, r.role_name_en from dataset_version as dsv, dataset_info as ds, user_info as u, user_role as r where dsv.owner_id = u.id and r.id = u.role_id and ds.id = dsv.dataset_id
mapper.select:
and dataset_id = #{datasetId}
and version_name like concat(#{namePrefix}, '%')
and version_tag like concat(#{tag}, '%')
order by dsv.id desc
mapper.insert: insert into dataset_version (dataset_id, owner_id, version_name, version_tag, version_meta, storage_path) select dataset_id, owner_id, version_name, version_tag, version_meta, storage_path from dataset_version where id = #{dsVersionId}

insert into dataset_version (dataset_id, owner_id, version_name, version_tag, version_meta, storage_path, files_uploaded) values(#{version.datasetId}, #{version.ownerId}, #{version.versionName}, #{version.versionTag}, #{version.versionMeta}, #{version.storagePath}, #{version.filesUploaded})
mapper.update: update dataset_version set version_tag = #{version.versionTag} where id = #{version.id}
update dataset_version set files_uploaded = #{version.filesUploaded} where id = #{version.id}
update dataset_version set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
